xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_KEEP_FLAMINGO_DISG: You changed from the mascot disguise.
Once you are disguised as the mascot, you cannot change disguises again or mission will fail.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_IN_CROWD: Do not leave the crowd for longer than 20 seconds once disguised as a medic
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_ADDITIONAL_ENFO: Additional civilians, workers, and guards enforce the Medic disguise
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_UNSPOTTE: The running coach can see through all disguises and suits. Getting compromised by him will fail the mission.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_NORUNNIN: The running Coach will now escort one of the Joggers.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_AQUARIUM_DESC: Dump all targets into the aquarium
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_D: Additional security cameras are present. If recorded by security camera, delete evidence within 2 minutes.
xx.9DE8AD44: Additional enforcers of the medic disguise added to the race marshall area.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_STICKY_FOOD_VENDOR: Once you equip the Food Vendor disguise, you cannot change disguises again, or mission will fail.
You changed from the Food Vendor disguise
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_MEDIC_DO_NOT_GET_S: If you are spotted doing anything illegal or suspicious while disguised as medic, you will fail the mission.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_SPOTTED_MEDIC_FAI: You were spotted while disguised as medic.

en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_KEEP_FLAMINGO_DISG: You changed from the mascot disguise.
Once you are disguised as the mascot, you cannot change disguises again or the mission will fail.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_IN_CROWD: Do not leave the crowd for longer than 20 seconds once disguised as a medic.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_ADDITIONAL_ENFO: Additional civilians, workers, and guards can see through the Medic disguise.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_UNSPOTTE: The running coach can see through all disguises and suits. Getting compromised by him will fail the mission.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_NORUNNIN: The running coach will now escort one of the joggers.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_AQUARIUM_DESC: Dump all targets into the aquarium
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_D: Additional security cameras are present. If recorded by security camera, delete evidence within 2 minutes.
en.9DE8AD44: Additional enforcers of the medic disguise added to the race marshal area.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_STICKY_FOOD_VENDOR: Once you equip the food vendor disguise, you cannot change disguises again, or the mission will fail.
You changed from the food vendor disguise.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_MEDIC_DO_NOT_GET_S: If you are spotted doing anything illegal or suspicious while disguised as a medic, you will fail the mission.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_SPOTTED_MEDIC_FAI: You were spotted while disguised as a medic.

fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_KEEP_FLAMINGO_DISG: Vous avez retiré le déguisement de mascotte.
Une fois que vous vous êtes déguisé en mascotte, vous ne pouvez plus changer, ou la mission échoue.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_IN_CROWD: Ne restez pas plus de 20 secondes hors de la foule une fois déguisé en médecin.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_ADDITIONAL_ENFO: Des civils, ouvriers et gardes en plus repèrent le déguisement de médecin.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_UNSPOTTE: Le coach sportif peut voir à travers tous les déguisements et tenues. S'il vous compromet, la mission est terminée.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_NORUNNIN: Le coach sportif escorte maintenant l'un des coureurs.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_AQUARIUM_DESC: Lâchez toutes les cibles dans l'aquarium
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_D: Des caméras de surveillance ont étés rajoutées. Si une caméra vous repère, vous avez 2 minutes pour effacer les preuves.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_O: Détruisez les vidéos de surveillance en moins de 2 minutes
fr.9DE8AD44: Des agents voyant à travers le déguisement de médecin ont été ajoutés à la zone de contrôle de la course.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_STICKY_FOOD_VENDOR: Une fois déguisez en vendeur de nourriture, vous ne pouvez plus changer de déguisement, ou la mission échouera.
Vous avez retiré le costume de vendeur de nourriture.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_MEDIC_DO_NOT_GET_S: Si vous êtes repéré à faire quelque chose d'illégal ou de suspicieux en portant le costume de médecin, la mission échouera.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_SPOTTED_MEDIC_FAI: Vous avez été repéré déguisé en médecin.

it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_KEEP_FLAMINGO_DISG: Non indossi più il travestimento da mascotte.
Non potrai più cambiare travestimento dopo aver indossato il travestimento da mascotte. Se lo farai, la missione fallirà.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_IN_CROWD: Non abbandonare la folla per oltre 20 secondi una volta travestito da medico.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_ADDITIONAL_ENFO: Ulteriori civili, lavoratori e guardie possono smascherare il tuo travestimento da medico.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_UNSPOTTE: L'istruttore di corsa può smascherare tutti i travestimenti e gli abiti. Se dovesse individuarti, fallirai la missione.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_NORUNNIN: L'istruttore di corsa accompagnerà uno dei corridori.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_D: Sono presenti telecamere di sorveglianza aggiuntive. Se vieni ripreso da una telecamera di sorveglianza, elimina le prove entro 2 minuti.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_O: Distruggi il nastro di sorveglianza entro 2 minuti
it.9DE8AD44: Nell'area del commissario di pista sono ora presenti ulteriori persone in grado di smascherare il travestimento da medico.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_STICKY_FOOD_VENDOR: Una volta equipaggiato il travestimento da venditore di cibo non potrai cambiare travestimento di nuovo, o la missione fallirà.
Hai cambiato il travestimento da venditore di cibo.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_MEDIC_DO_NOT_GET_S: Se vieni scoperto mentre fai qualcosa di illegale o di sospetto mentre sei travestito da medico, fallirai la missione.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_SPOTTED_MEDIC_FAI: Sei stato scoperto mentre eri travestito da medico.

de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_KEEP_FLAMINGO_DISG: Wenn Sie die Maskottchen-Verkleidung einmal angelegt haben, können Sie sie nicht mehr ablegen, sonst scheitert die Mission.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_IN_CROWD: Verlassen Sie die Menge nie länger als 20 Sekunden, sobald Sie als Arzt verkleidet sind.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_ADDITIONAL_ENFO: Zusätzliche Zivilisten, Arbeiter und Wachen durchschauen die Arzt-Verkleidung.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_UNSPOTTE: Der Laufcoach kann alle Verkleidungen und Anzüge durchschauen. Wird man von ihm bemerkt, scheitert die Mission.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_NORUNNIN: Der Laufcoach begleitet jetzt einen der Jogger.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_AQUARIUM_DESC: Beseitigen Sie alle Ziele im Aquarium
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_D: Zusätzliche Sicherheitskameras sind vorhanden. Werden Sie von einer Kamera aufgenommen, löschen Sie die Beweise innerhalb von 2 Minuten.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_O: Löschen Sie das Sicherheitsvideo innerhalb von 2 Minuten
de.9DE8AD44: Zusätzliche Aufpasser für die Arzt-Verkleidung befinden sich im Rennwartbereich.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_STICKY_FOOD_VENDOR: Wenn Sie die Essensverkäufer-Verkleidung einmal angelegt haben, können Sie sie nicht mehr ablegen, sonst scheitert die Mission.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_MEDIC_DO_NOT_GET_S: Die Mission scheitert, sobald Sie als Sanitäter bei verdächtigen oder illegalen Aktionen erwischt werden.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_SPOTTED_MEDIC_FAI: Sie wurden als Sanitäter verkleidet erwischt.

es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_KEEP_FLAMINGO_DISG: Te has quitado el disfraz de mascota.
Una vez te pongas el disfraz de mascota, no podrás cambiar de disfraz o la misión fracasará.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_IN_CROWD: Una vez disfrazado de médico, no salgas de entre la multitud durante más de 20 segundos.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_ADDITIONAL_ENFO: El disfraz de médico resulta más creíble si vas acompañado de civiles, trabajadores y guardias.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_UNSPOTTE: Al entrenador de carreras no se le engaña con ningún disfraz o traje. Si te reconoce, la misión será un fracaso.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_FLAMINGO_HIDING_NORUNNIN: Ahora, el entrenador acompañará a uno de los corredores.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_AQUARIUM_DESC: Tira a todos los objetivos al acuario
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_D: Hay más cámaras de seguridad. Si te graban, borra la prueba en 2 minutos.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_SECURED_AQUARIUM_O: Borra la cinta de seguridad en 2 minutos
es.9DE8AD44: El disfraz de médico se detectará más fácilmente en la zona del comisario de carrera.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_STICKY_FOOD_VENDOR: Una vez que te disfraces de vendedor de comida, no podrás cambiar de disfraz de nuevo o la misión fracasará.
Te has quitado el disfraz de vendedor de comida
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_MIAMI_MEDIC_DO_NOT_GET_S: Si te descubren realizando alguna acción sospechosa o ilegal mientras estés disfrazado de médico, la misión fracasará.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_SPOTTED_MEDIC_FAI: Has sido descubierto mientras usabas el disfraz de médico.
